ABOUT_TEXT: I-STAFF offers complete accommodation solutions on the island of Mykonos, upgrading the standards of the residences for seasonal workers. I-STAFF addresses both individuals seeking accommodation for the summer season and companies facilitating them with the accommodation of their employees. At the same time, I-STAFF acts as an intermediary for property owners looking for tenants, guaranteeing that the property will be returned in its original condition after the end of the rental period.
CONTACT_TEXT: Fill out the form and out team will get back to you as soon as possible.
COOKIES_POLICY_GENERAL:
We use cookies to help you navigate efficiently and perform certain functions. You will find detailed information about all cookies under each consent category below.
The cookies that are categorized as "Necessary" are stored on your browser as they are essential for enabling the basic functionalities of the site.
We also use third-party cookies that help us analyze how you use this website, store your preferences, and provide the content and advertisements that are relevant to you. These cookies will only be stored in your browser with your prior consent.
You can choose to enable or disable some or all of these cookies but disabling some of them may affect your browsing experience.
COOKIES_POLICY_SECTION1: Necessary cookies are required to enable the basic features of this site, such as providing secure log-in or adjusting your consent preferences. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable data.
COOKIES_POLICY_SECTION2: Functional cookies help perform certain functionalities like sharing the content of the website on social media platforms, collecting feedback, and other third-party features.
COOKIES_POLICY_SECTION3: Analytical cookies are used to understand how visitors interact with the website. These cookies help provide information on metrics such as the number of visitors, bounce rate, traffic source, etc.
COOKIES_POLICY_SECTION4: Performance cookies are used to understand and analyze the key performance indexes of the website which helps in delivering a better user experience for the visitors.
COOKIES_POLICY_SECTION5: Advertisement cookies are used to provide visitors with customized advertisements based on the pages you visited previously and to analyze the effectiveness of the ad campaigns.
COPYRIGHT_TEXT: The entire content of this website, including real estate data, texts, graphics, photos, videos, services provided, is the intellectual property of i-staff.gr and is governed by national and international provisions on Intellectual Property. Logos, brands, trademarks and features included in the website belong to i-staff.gr and are protected in accordance with the existing legislation on industrial and intellectual property.
HOW_IT_WORKS_TEXT1: You contact our office describing your needs, the number of employees you wish to house, your housing criteria and available budget.
HOW_IT_WORKS_TEXT2: We search for properties that fully meet the needs we have previously discussed so that we can provide your staff with the best possible accommodation during their working hours.
HOW_IT_WORKS_TEXT3: Upon acceptance of the offer, we will bring you in contact with the owners of the properties you have chosen in order to complete the leasing process.
HOW_IT_WORKS_TITLE2: We search for the best accommodation arrangements
HOW_IT_WORKS_TITLE3: Bring you in contact with estate owners

WHY_REASON1_TEXT: With years of experience in the Mykonos real estate market, we guarantee the best result for your particular needs.
WHY_REASON2_TEXT: Our goal is to deliver to your business solutions with the best value for money.
WHY_SUPPORT_TEXT: You will always have an experienced colleague of us by your side.
